author.bio: Academic technologist and pedagogic outfitter. WordPressing since 2010. Themes, plugins, security, tweaks
Web application security and accessibility evangelist. Software instructor. Conference lecturer and presenter.

wordpressPost.title: Vulnerable Plugins report for the week of September 6th, 2019
wordpressPost.excerpt: 26 vulnerabilities this week, with 7 needing a fix (with some, possibly,  on the way). Formidable Forms appears for the fourth time in a month, so you may wish to...
wordpressPost.content:
26 vulnerabilities this week, with 7 needing a fix (with some, possibly,  on the way). Formidable Forms appears for the fourth time in a month, so you may wish to look elsewhere. Landing Pages by SwiftCloud is still on the directory (but closed), but the latest commit has deleted everything for unknown security reasons.

In other news, WordPress 5.2.3 came out – and there’s a few vulnerabilities patched in it. Wordfence unpack it for you.

View this week’s vulnerable plugins list
